attributes.action: Deport all foreign criminals to their country of origin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our prisons are so overcrowded that dangerous murderers and sex offenders are released early just to make space for new convicts.
It costs around £19000 to keep one inmate for one year which is more than many hard working UK citizens get paid per annum.
ANY non-UK person that is convicted to serve time in prison, for any offence, should be deported to their home country immediately and not waste any more public funds following the cost of their trial.  The ONLY exception should be if their home country is currently in a state of civil war.  There should be no other exceptions and this should include people from other European countries.
